com.ephesoft.dcma.imagemagick.service

Interface ImageProcessService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageProcessServiceImpl

    public interface ImageProcessService
    This service provides image processing APIs. These APIs performs various operations like creation of thumbnail, rotation of images, multipage tiff and PDF files creation, single page tiff creation from multipage.
    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on Jun 20, 2013
    See Also:
    ImageProcessServiceImpl

      • generateThumbnailsAndPNGsForImage

        void generateThumbnailsAndPNGsForImage(java.io.File imagePath,
                                     java.lang.String thumbnailW,
                                     java.lang.String thumbnailH)
                                       throws DCMAException
        This method generates thumbnails and pngs for given image.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - File
        thumbnailW - String
        thumbnailH - String
        Throws:
        DCMAException

      • generateThumbnailsAndJPGsForImage

        void generateThumbnailsAndJPGsForImage(java.io.File imagePath,
                                     java.lang.String thumbnailW,
                                     java.lang.String thumbnailH)
                                       throws DCMAException
        Generates thumbnail and corresponding JPG for the image passed as parameter.

        These generated images are used to display images on UI. Thus jpeg images takes less memory in comparison to other type images. The images may loose some information as they are converted to jpeg.

        Parameters:
        imagePath - String path of image whose thumbnails and image needs to be generated. Cannot be NULL.
        thumbnailW - String width of thumbnail image. Cannot be NULL.
        thumbnailH - String height of thumbnail image. Cannot be NULL.
        Throws:
        DCMAException - if unable to generate images for the given file.

      • convertPdfOrMultiPageTiffToTiff

        void convertPdfOrMultiPageTiffToTiff(BatchClass batchClass,
                                   java.io.File imagePath,
                                   java.io.File outputFilePath,
                                   BatchInstanceThread batchInstanceThread,
                                   java.lang.Boolean allowPdfConversion,
                                   boolean deleteImage)
                                     throws DCMAException
        This method converts a given Multi page tiff into single page tiffs. Also depending upon the parameter allowPdfConversion it can convert a multi page pdf to single page tiffs too. The output files will be generated in the same folder.
        Parameters:
        batchClass - BatchClass
        imagePath - File
        outputFilePath - (@link File}
        batchInstanceThread - BatchInstanceThread
        allowPdfConversion - Boolean
        Throws:
        DCMAException

      • convertPdfOrMultiPageTiffToTiff

        java.util.List<java.io.File> convertPdfOrMultiPageTiffToTiff(BatchClassID batchClassID,
                                                           java.lang.String folderPath,
                                                           java.io.File testImageFile,
                                                           java.lang.Boolean isTestAdvancedKV,
                                                           BatchInstanceThread batchInstanceThread)
                                                             throws DCMAException
        This method converts all the pdf's and tiff's placed inside folder to single page tiff's. In case of a multi-page pdf single tiff's for each page will be created. The output files will be generated in the same folder.
        Parameters:
        batchClassID - BatchClassID
        folderPath - String
        testImageFile - File
        isTestAdvancedKV - Boolean
        batchInstanceThread - BatchInstanceThread
        Returns:
        List<File> - file paths of all original files.
        Throws:
        DCMAException

      • createTifToPDF

        void createTifToPDF(java.lang.String pdfGeneratorEngine,
                  java.lang.String[] files,
                  BatchInstanceThread pdfBatchInstanceThread,
                  java.lang.String inputParams,
                  java.lang.String outputParams)
                    throws DCMAException
        API for creating pdf from single tif file.
        Parameters:
        pdfGeneratorEngine - String pdfGeneration engine values can be ITEXT and IMAGE_MAGICK
        files - String[] array of file size of 2 having input file absoulte path and output file absolute path.
        pdfBatchInstanceThread - BatchInstanceThread
        inputParams - String this parameter will used in case of IMAGE_MAGICK used as pdf generator engine
        outputParams - String this parameter will used in case of IMAGE_MAGICK used as pdf generator engine
        Throws:
        DCMAException - if exception or error occurs during processing

      • createSearchablePDF

        void createSearchablePDF(java.lang.String[] imageUrl,
                       java.util.List<HocrPages.HocrPage> hocrPageList,
                       java.lang.String coloredPDF,
                       java.lang.String searchablePDF,
                       java.lang.String documentIdInt,
                       java.lang.String outputPDFFile,
                       java.lang.String fontFilePath,
                       java.lang.String iTextSearchablePDFType)
                         throws DCMAApplicationException
        /** creates the searchable PDF using iTextPDFCreator. Output would be generated on stream.
        Parameters:
        imageUrl - String[] is the absolute url of the image/tiff file
        hocrPageList - List is list of HOCR pages of image files
        coloredPDF - String is indicator for colored PDF which can have values; True or False
        searchablePDF - String is indicator for seachable PDF which can have values; True or False
        documentIdInt - String is the name of the file for which searchable PDF is to be generated
        outputPDFFile - String is the path of intermediate outputPDF which is copied at the end
        fontFilePath - String is the path of font file
        iTextSearchablePDFType - String can have values PDF or PDF-A which decides to generate normally or in advanced manner respectively
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - if error occurs while generating searchablePDF
